summary: CAR WAS PARKED IN FIRST GEAR WITH PARKING BREAK UP.  CAR WAS HIT WITH HARDLY ANY FORCE AND ROLLED BACK INTO ANOTHER VEHICLE...  DID NOT KNOW THERE WAS A RECALL ON THIS UNTIL TODAY MARCH 8, 2003.  ALSO NUMEROUS TIMES CAR HAS BEEN IN SHOP FOR CHECK ENGINE LIGHT...NO ONE KNOWS WHAT CAUSES IT COME ON.. SPENT $2000 SO FAR.   *NLM
